data.text: @imgrund @jkenney Shockingly weak leadership on almost every file. He could have walked away after federal politics with a sweet pension and a world of new opportunities. Hunger for power without a sense of duty is a sickness. IMO, that patient is entering the terminal stage.
@imgrund @jkenney Here in Alberta, Groundhog Day isn't just a once a year thing

@imgrund @jkenney Not as many as Ontario's PC premier. Look at the numbers due to timely inaction or in our LTC's. It seems to be a party thing.
@imgrund @jkenney at this point we really need to remove health measures from political discussion. They are not qualified, and clearly self-interests have corrupted them.
